Reviews.Title: Dandy Little Hi-Def TV
Reviews.Author: DP2300 "Uptown-Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this on a whim for my bedroom, priced suspiciously under $300.  Plugged it into HDTV cable box, and it has a groovy high-def picture and good stereo sound.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great little bedroom/kid's TV
Reviews.Author: J. Miller
Reviews.Content: No frills, but for the price this is a great little set. The color is reasonably good without tinkering. For a little set, the sound is outstanding. I've had it for over a year, using DIRECT TV, no problems.

ProductInfo.Features:
15 Inch LCD TV
Pixel Resolution XGA /1024x768
Response Speed 16 /ms/
Contrast Ratio 450:1 /Brightness 250 /cd/m2
10.4 Lbs (WxLxH) 6.5" x 18.6" x 14.3"
ProductInfo.Name: Sylvania LC155SL8 15-Inch LCD HDTV
